      • getRoomsTable

        public java.lang.String getRoomsTable()
        This method constructs the tables that you see in browse-reservations. Here I create the structure for the jQuery tabs for the rooms Each tab will show the table/availability schedule for the selected room number. To show the times, I created a string table block that is used in the loop to query if a room is available at the time if the room is unavailable, the cell will have an ID of red if the room is available, the cell will have and ID of green if the time select (in the loop) is less than the current time, the cell ID is gray. If it is 11 minutes past current time, the cell will have in ID of yellow. Yellow means that the room was reserved but is now open for everyone (without a reservation) Gray means that time has past so you can reserve a room at that time information is sent via hidden forms to make a Browse Reserve Servlet uses Date Time Converter and Time converter classes to convert, parse, of format date or times a key table is at the bottom of each schedule table in the tabs.
        Returns:
        String HTML table

      • ListRoomsInBuilding

        public java.lang.String ListRoomsInBuilding(int buildingID,
                                            java.lang.String cancelAction)
        This method takes a building record id and lists all the rooms in that building
        Parameters:
        buildingID, - action (where to send it when canceling/going back to previous calling page
        cancelAction - send Cancel action redirect to buildings or rooms servlet
        Returns:
        the html table containing the rooms in the building

      • createEditRoomForm

        public java.lang.String createEditRoomForm(int roomID,
                                           java.lang.String cancelAction)
        This method takes the room ID and creates a form already populated with the room info. The form is meant to edit the room data by an amin.
        Parameters:
        roomID - ID of the room the user wants to edit
        cancelAction - send cancellation
        Returns:
        String HTML table for the edited room

        This method takes the data about the room and updates the room's record in the Rooms table
        Parameters:
        roomID - table record ID for room
        roomNumber - room number
        roomFloor - the floor of the room in the building
        roomStatus - 0 for offline, 1 for online
        adminID - table record ID for the admin in the database

      • insertRoomsTable
